name: Arcade Style Footrace
description:
Alternate 'D' and 'F' at a certain frequency to run and dodge the hurdles with the left and right arrow keys. Try to go as far as you can in 60 seconds.

All programming, art, music and sound effects done by me.

Sorry about missing the deadline, I had difficulties exporting from Godot as a first time user :/

Hint: the music helps with keeping the right rhythm for optimal acceleration.

The post version was done after the jam, reacting to feedback by the players.
